name: 秦毓權
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation/Warm Up
Week 2-4: (R/W: Unit 6-Give and Learn)(L/S: Unit 6-Giving to others)
Week 5-7: (R/W: Unit 7- Homing in on Education)(L/S: Unit 7- What's the Use of Homework?
Week 8: In class Mid-term Exam
Week 9: Campus-wide Mid-term exam
Week 10-12: (R/W: Unit 8-Eat to Live and Live to Eat?)(L/S: Unit 8-Goodbye to the Sid-down Meal)
Week 13-14: (R/W: Unit 9- The Grass Is Always Greener)(L/S:Unit 9 - Finding a Niche)
Week 15-16: (R/W: Unit 10- Take It or Leave It)(L/S: Unit 10 -No Technology? No Way!)
Week 17: In class Final Exam
Week 18: Campus-wide Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
Type of assignment	           Total points available   	Due Dates
presentation	                       10%
Mid-term Exam (campus wide)	              15%   	 Week 9
Final Exam (campus wide)	              15%	          Week 18
Mid-term Exam/Final exam	              14%/14%=28%	 Week 8/week 17
Homework (including essay)	              10%
In class assignment (including quizzes)   22%
materials:
NorthStar 4 Reading and Writing 3rd Edition ISBN: 9780136133186
NorthStar 4 Listening and Speaking 3rd Edition ISBN: 9780132056779
